intro: Cliffortia varians, commonly known as the variable cliffortia, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the family Fabaceae, also known as the legume or bean family. This species is characterized by its delicate, fragrant flowers that range in color from white to pink and purple. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and is often found in coastal or mountainous regions. It is a small shrub that produces small, bean-like pods containing seeds.
